Player History
Drafted in 12th round, 191st overall pick, by Boston in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/2/2015, off Clarence Palmer (SEA)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/14/2015, off Timo Morabito (HOU)...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 3/1/2017 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 4/1/2017 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for 6 days...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/12/2018 to a 2-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by Seattle on 3/2/2018.
Was claimed off waivers by Houston on 8/10/2018.
Released by Houston on 8/20/2018...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/15/2019 to a 1-year deal worth $900,000 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by Houston on 3/7/2019.
Released by Houston on 5/26/2019...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/14/2020 to a 2-year deal worth $800,000 per year...
